Name: Acorns Above: A World Gone Nuts
About the game: Three years ago, C.A.F. Satellites detected a wormhole just outside the solar system. Now, a fleet of Space Squirrels has emerged, intent on destroying all that we hold dear. Diplomacy has failed us. Chipmunks, we must unite! You will take your place as one of the foremost pilots in our fleet of planes, spaceships, and submarines. You will face the squirrel menace where-ever they challenge us. Defend our territory, destroy the enemy bases, and gather those acorns! We will take the battle to them! * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * Acorns Above: A World Gone Nuts is a top down shooter game which places you in the role of a chipmunk piloting a aircraft (or space ship, or submarine). You will. . . * Fly and fight across fifteen levels set in distinct environments. Recover acorns in the skies of our world, take out enemy bases in space, and rescue downed chipmunks in the deep seas. * Face off against the evil Space Squirrels and their Red Fleet of star ships, submarines, planes and robo-turrets! Take the fight to their bases and into the heart of their battle cruisers as you defend the rest of rodent kind! * Victory will be rewarded! The more enemy planes you take down, the better your craft gets - from the humble Furwing and Astronut, to the dreaded OMG-111!
